summary.description:
Reassembling Linux-based Hybrid RAID.

Tool of rebuild RAID against Linux based hybrid RAID.

This tool can rebuild RAID against Linux based hybrid RAID. This tool was developed in python.

input : only raw image file. input the directory path.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'RAID', 'hybrid RAID', 'RAID Reconstructor', 'RAID reassembly'
summary.name: Hybrid RAID Reconstructor
